data.title: Blue Ridge Orthodontics - PatientRewardsHub.com™
data.text:
A native of Spartanburg, SC, Dr. T. Luke Roberts opened Blue Ridge Orthodontics in the summer of 2007 after receiving his Doctorate of Dental Medicine from the University Of Pennsylvania School Of Dental Medicine and Master of Science in Dentistry from the Medical College of Virginia. He graduated first in his class in dental school, and achieved unrivaled success in his orthodontics residency. Dr. Roberts also holds a Bachelor of Science degree in biology from Davidson College.

Dr. Roberts loves seeing the transition that occurs when a person who has been self-conscious about their teeth and smile their entire life develops into a radiant, confident person with a great smile to back it up! He also loves our patients for their friendly and positive attitudes. Dr. Roberts knows that achieving a great smile is a team effort, and without patients who are willing to work with him it would be impossible to achieve such beautiful and functional final results.

When he’s not busy creating beautiful smiles, Dr. Roberts is deeply involved in continuing education concerning both traditional orthodontia and Invisalign®. Additionally, he invests a lot of time in continuing education for practice management. This combination of clinical and practice management provides our patients at Blue Ridge Orthodontics the best mix of cutting-edge technology and a fantastic experience during their orthodontic treatment.

Dr. Roberts, who is one of only two orthodontists in Asheville Board Certified by the American Board of Orthodontics, is an active member in many leading dental organizations and associations. These include:

American Association of Orthodontists

Southern Association of Orthodontists

North Carolina Association of Orthodontists

American Dental Association

North Carolina Dental Society

Past President, Buncombe County Dental Society

Past President, Blue Ridge Dental Study Club

Omicron Kappa Upsilon Dental Honor Society

Matthew H. Cryer Eta Sigma Academic Honor Society

Alpha Omega International Dental Fraternity

Founding member of Asheville Interdisciplinary Dental Study Club

Dr. Roberts and his wife, Beth, live in Asheville with their children Quinn, Emma, and Charlie. Dr. Roberts’ hobbies include playing the guitar, banjo and mandolin. He also loves exquisite cuisine and is an avid cook.

Fun facts:

What color is your toothbrush?

Black and White

What is your super power?

Creating the most beautiful/handsome smiles ever!!

What is one thing on your bucket list?

Visit Madagascar!

If you could trade lives with anyone for a day, who would it be?

Jimmy Fallon

If you were stranded on an island what two things would you want with you?

My guitar and a hammock
